title: Blood Passage
description: Would you believe a small boy who claims he was a murder victim in his previous life? Homicide Lt. Hank Donaghue and Detective Karen Stainer investigate a cold case in which little Taylor Chan begins to spontaneously recall memories of his life as Martin Liu, the victim. Skeptical, Donaghue and Stainer are forced to play catch-up to the boy's Uncle Peter, a deadly Triad enforcer seeking vengeance!
author: Michael J.  McCann
